TITLE: ACCC SERVER MANAGER - GUI
SERVER_NAME_TOOLTIP: The server name displayed in the ACC UI pages
ADMIN_PASS_TOOLTIP: The password you specify allows a driver or spectator to log in as Server Admin in the chat window ( ENTER key ) of the server.
TRACKMEDALS_REQUIREMENT_TOOLTIP: Defines the amount of track medals that a user has to have for the given track (values, 0, 1, 2, 3)
SAFETYRATING_REQUIREMENT_TOOLTIP: Defines the Safety Rating (SA) that a user must have to join this server (values, -1~99)
RACECRAFTRATING_REQUIREMENT_TOOLTIP: Defines the Racecraft Rating (RC) that a user must have to join this server (values, -1~99)
PASSWORD_TOOLTIP: Password required to enter this server. If a password is set, the server is declared
SPECTATOR_PASSWORD_TOOLTIP: Password to enter the server as spectator. Must be different to “password” if both is set.
